affymetrix.calvin.parsers
Class GenericFileReader

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.calvin.parsers.GenericFileReader

public class GenericFileReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads a generic data file. It is the top-level generic data file reader.

readHeader

public void readHeader(GenericData data,
                       GenericFileReader.ReadHeaderOption option)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       InvalidVersionException,
                       InvalidFileTypeException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Read the file header of the generic file.

Parameters:
data - A reference to a GenericData object that will receive header information from the file.
option - Indicates how much DataGroupHeader and DataSetHeader information to read.
Throws:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException - The file does not exist.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException - The file version does not match.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException - The file is not of the right type.
java.io.FileNotFoundException

open

public void open(GenericData data,
                 GenericFileReader.OpenHint hint)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 InvalidVersionException,
                 InvalidFileTypeException,
                 NotImplementedException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Open the file for reading

Parameters:
data - A reference to a GenericData object that will receive header information from the file. Amount of info depends on the hint.
hint - A hint on how to open the file.
Throws:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException - The file does not exist.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException - The file version does not match.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException - The file is not of the right type.

readFileHeaderMinDP

private void readFileHeaderMinDP(GenericData data)
                          throws InvalidVersionException,
                                 InvalidFileTypeException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Read the file header and minimize amount of information read from the DataSetHeaders. It does not attempt to read the complete DataSetHeader. That is deferred until accessed by the DataSet object.

Parameters:
data - Reference to the GenericData object to fill.
Throws:
InvalidVersionException
InvalidFileTypeException
java.io.IOException
UnsignedOutOfLimitsException

                                      throws InvalidVersionException,
                                             InvalidFileTypeException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Reads the file header of the generic file but does not read any DataGroupHeaders or DataSetHeaders.
